description:
The job title is NLP engineer Remote, and the description is as follows: 

Project Description: We are seeking a highly skilled NLP engineer to join our team remotely. The ideal candidate will be responsible for analyzing and preprocessing large-scale text data, as well as developing prototypes and conducting PoCs in areas such as LLM, NLP, DL, ML, and object detection/classification.  Skills used includes NLP, Pytorch, Computer Vision, Python.. The skills required for the job are NLP, Pytorch, Computer Vision, Python.
